name: libos

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: libos robot
Developer Terms of Use
des: You need to have a libos home account, and click the link to associate your account. After that, you can control your libos robot through alexa.（You can use this function to control the libos robot, clean, pause, charge and other functions）
